Iowans play a vital role in hosting the first-in-the-nation presidential caucus, and it is our privilege to offer this Presidential Lecture Series in order to provide our very influential base an opportunity to gain insight into our political process, said Bob Vander Plaats , president and CEO of The FAMiLY LEADER.
